tool_description: The FatSecret Platform API is the #1 verified food and nutrition database in the world, available for 55+ countries in 23 languages.
name: FatSecret
title: FatSecret

api_list.name: /Recipe Get
api_list.description: Returns detailed information for the specified recipe for the standard serving.

required_parameters.name: recipe_id
required_parameters.description: Search expression to match on food names

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The desired response format. Valid response formats are **xml** or **json** (default value is **xml**)

api_list.name: /Food Get
api_list.description:
Returns food elements best matching the search expression specified, ordered by their relevancy to the search expression.

Please note: For utilizing any Premier API capability such as food.search.v2, auto-complete, barcode search or localization (=accessing non-US and non-English content) please contact us and provide your API key/Client ID, which we would be pleased to provision for you: https://platform.fatsecret.com/contact

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The desired response format. Valid response formats are **xml** or **json** (default value is **xml**)

api_list.name: /Recipe Search
api_list.description:
Conducts a search of the recipe database using the search expression specified. The results are paginated according to a zero-based "page" offset. Successive pages of results may be retrieved by specifying a starting page offset value. For instance, specifying a max_results of 10 and page_number of 4 will return results numbered 41-50.

Returns detailed nutritional information for the specified recipes. Use this call to return ingredients,  cooking directions and time as well as nutrition values for a recipe.

required_parameters.name: search_expression
required_parameters.description: Search expression to match on food names

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: Zero-based offset into the results for the query

api_list.name: /Food Search v1
api_list.description:
Conducts a search of the food database using the search expression specified. The results are paginated according to a zero-based "page" offset. Successive pages of results may be retrieved by specifying a starting page offset value. For instance, specifying a max_results of 10 and page_number of 4 will return results numbered 41-50.

Returns detailed nutritional information for the specified food. Use this call to display nutrition values for a food to users.

Please note: For utilizing any Premier API capability such as food.search.v2, auto-complete, barcode search or localization (=accessing non-US and non-English content) please contact us and provide your API key/Client ID, which we would be pleased to provision for you: https://platform.fatsecret.com/contact

required_parameters.name: search_expression
required_parameters.description: Search expression to match on food names

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The desired response format. Valid response formats are **xml** or **json** (default value is **xml**)

optional_parameters.name: page_number
optional_parameters.description: Zero-based offset into the results for the query

api_list.name: /Food Search v2 (Premier Only)
api_list.description:
Conducts a search of the food database using the search expression specified. The results are paginated according to a zero-based "page" offset. Successive pages of results may be retrieved by specifying a starting page offset value. For instance, specifying a max_results of 10 and page_number of 4 will return results numbered 41-50.

Returns detailed nutritional information for the specified food. Use this call to display nutrition values for a food to users.

Please note: For utilizing any Premier API capability such as food.search.v2, auto-complete, barcode search or localization (=accessing non-US and non-English content) please contact us and provide your API key/Client ID, which we would be pleased to provision for you: https://platform.fatsecret.com/contact

api_list.name: /Find Id For Barcode (Premier Only)
api_list.description:
Returns the food_id matching the barcode specified. Barcodes must be specified as GTIN-13 numbers - a 13-digit number filled in with zeros for the spaces to the left. UPC-A, EAN-13 and EAN-8 barcodes may be specified. UPC-E barcodes should be converted to their UPC-A equivalent (and then specified as GTIN-13 numbers).

Please note: For utilizing any Premier API capability such as food.search.v2, auto-complete, barcode search or localization (=accessing non-US and non-English content) please contact us and provide your API key/Client ID, which we would be pleased to provision for you: https://platform.fatsecret.com/contact

required_parameters.name: barcode
required_parameters.description: 13-digit GTIN-13 formatted sequence of digits representing the barcode to search against

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Results will be filtered by region. E.G.: **FR** returns results from France

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The desired response format. Valid response formats are **xml** or **json** (default value is **xml**)

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: (Ignored unless region is also specified) Results will be in the specified language. E.G.: **fr** returns results in French

api_list.name: /Food Autocomplete Search (Premier Only)
api_list.description:
Returns food elements best matching the search expression specified, ordered by their relevancy to the search expression.

Please note: For utilizing any Premier API capability such as food.search.v2, auto-complete, barcode search or localization (=accessing non-US and non-English content) please contact us and provide your API key/Client ID, which we would be pleased to provision for you: https://platform.fatsecret.com/contact

required_parameters.name: expression
required_parameters.description: Suggestions for the given expression is returned. E.G.: **chic** will return up to four of the best suggestions that contains **chic**

optional_parameters.name: language
optional_parameters.description: (Ignored unless region is also specified) Results will be in the specified language. E.G.: **fr** returns results in French

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The desired response format. Valid response formats are **xml** or **json** (default value is **xml**)

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: Results will be filtered by region. E.G.: **FR **returns results from France
